data.eml:eml: A new species of the Polyonyx sinensis group (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Porcellanidae) from the Central Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Osawa, Masayuki (2018): A new species of the Polyonyx sinensis group (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Porcellanidae) from the Central Philippines. Zootaxa 4486 (3): 393-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.3.10
